summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were higher on Thursday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: March 16
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were higher on Thursday, with 16 gaining and the other three declining.
Bitcoin rose 2.8% to $25,028 by market close.
